get.summary: Fetch Fake Provider Configurations Details for a specific ProviderConfigurationId.

put.summary: Updates a provider configuration which delivers SMS via Fake Provider.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: A valid SubscriptionId in which you are an owner/contributor

parameters.name: providerConfigurationId
parameters.description: A valid ProviderConfigurationId of the config which needs to be updated

200.description:
Indicates the provider configuration was successfully updated, and returns
            the provider configuration ID.

400.description:
Indicates the provider configuration could not be updated because
            there was a problem with the provided details. Possible reasons include with key / Value :
             * Field Name / The body has missing or invalid values (e.g. invalid phone number, body missing, etc)
             * Error / The provider credentials are expired or do not exist in the providers system
             * Error / The provider is temporarily not responding (unreachable)
             * Error / The provider responded with an unknown/unanticipated error

post.summary:
Creates a provider configuration which delivers SMS via LINK Mobility SMS REST API (Common a.k.a. CGI).
Url: https://linkmobility.com/services/link-sms-gateway/

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: A valid SubscriptionId in which you are an owner/contributor

200.description:
Indicates the provider configuration was successfully created, and returns
            the unique provider configuration ID.

400.description:
Indicates the provider configuration could not be created because
            there was a problem with the provided details. Possible reasons include with key / Value :
             * Field Name / The body has missing or invalid values (e.g. invalid phone number, body missing, etc)
             * Error / The provider credential are expired or does not exist in the providers system
             * Error / The provider is temporarily not responding (unreachable)
             * Error / The provider responded with an unknown/unanticipated error

400.description:

200.description:

get.summary: Lists all available provider configurations for the subscription.

delete.summary: Delete Provider Configurations for a specific ProviderConfigurationId.

get.summary: Retrieve message delivery details by message Id

parameters.name: smsMessageId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the SMS message

404.description: The SMS message was not found

200.description: The SMS was queued for delivery

post.summary: Sends Sms message to multiple recipients.

200.description: The SMS was queued for delivery

A custom name that can be used to later understand the purpose of
this provider configuration.

source.description:
This is the source from where the message should be sent. 3 to 11 valid GSM characters. Some operators
and some handsets don’t accept all characters. Safe characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9.

platformId.description: Provided to you by LINK Mobility Support

platformPartnerId.description: Provided to you by LINK Mobility Support

toPhoneNumber.description: The phone number of recipient of the test SMS in E.164 format. Example: +4537360734

body.description: The text of the SMS message

isApproved.description:
Determines if this configuration is approved by the logic platform for use. Any logic provider
must first be approved before it can be used.

sender.description:
If not specified, the Logic DevOps team will need to provide this value
before you can send SMS using this provider configuration. Example values
might be 'logic' or 'kmd' or 'føniks' etc.

The unique ID of the provider configuration, which can be used to send SMS requests.

name.description: A user-provided display that describes the provider configuration.

description.description:
Internal details of the provider configuration, which are suitable for being
displayed in a list, and help the reader to identity the provider configuration
at a glance.

type.description: The SMS gateway (SMS Provider) type display name. E.g. "Twilio" or "LinkMobility".

isApproved.description: The Status for Sms logic provider

smsMessageId.description: A unique identifier for the SMS message.

toPhoneNumber.description: Phone number of recipient example accepted phone number: +4537360734

body.description: The text of the SMS message

callbackUrl.description:
If provided, this URL endpoint will receive a POST request when there is any
change of the SMS message status (e.g. sending, sent and failed).

providerConfigurationId.description:
A unique identifier that represents the SMS provider and associated configuration 
which this SMS message will be sent with.

userData.description:
Can be anything, depends on user/consumer. 
If provided, this custom data will be passed to the callback.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Standard Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "bearer {token}". You can obtain that value from your browser Developer tools
